environment_variables.DGXSYSTEM: A variable indicating the system type (e.g., DGX-A100)
environment_variables.CONT: The container image to use for the experiment
environment_variables.DATADIR: The directory where the data is stored
environment_variables.NEXP: The number of experiments to run (default: 10)
environment_variables.DATESTAMP: The timestamp of the experiment, used for file naming
environment_variables.CLEAR_CACHES: Whether to clear the caches before each experiment (default: 1)
environment_variables.CHECK_COMPLIANCE: Whether to run the MLPerf compliance checker (default: 1)
environment_variables.MLPERF_RULESET: The MLPerf ruleset version to use (default: 2.1.0)
environment_variables.MOUNTS: The mount points for the container (default: DATADIR:/data)
environment_variables.LOGDIR: The directory to store the results (default: ./results)
environment_variables.DLRM_BIND: The network binding for the DLRM application (default: null)
environment_variables.MLPERF_SUBMISSION_PLATFORM: The platform used for the experiment
